hero.title: Your Pet, Immortalised in Art
hero.subtitle: Transform your beloved pet's photo into a stunning, museum-quality artistic portrait using cutting-edge AI. Choose from a curated collection of world-class art styles.

howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to your pet's masterpiece
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload a clear, well-lit photo of your pet
howItWorks.step2Desc: Select from our curated collection of artistic styles
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get your high-resolution portrait in seconds

gallery.title: Art Styles Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore our curated collection of world-class artistic styles, each crafted to bring out the unique personality of your pet.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect package for your pet portraits. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.

printShop.title: Bring Your Art Home
printShop.subtitle: Transform your digital portraits into stunning physical prints, delivered to your door.
printShop.qualityDesc: Premium canvas prints with archival-quality inks that last a lifetime.
printShop.shippingDesc: Fast, insured delivery across the EU. Carefully packaged to arrive perfect.
printShop.secureDesc: Pay safely with Stripe. Your payment details are always protected.

testimonials.title: Loved by Pet Owners
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers say about their RexPet portraits

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about RexPet
faq.a1: Simply upload a clear photo of your pet, choose an artistic style from our curated collection, and our AI will generate a stunning portrait in under 60 seconds. You can then download your high-resolution masterpiece or order a physical print.
faq.q2: What resolution are the generated images?
faq.a2: All generated portraits are produced in 2K resolution, suitable for digital display and high-quality printing up to large canvas sizes.
faq.q3: How long are generated images available?
faq.a3: Generated images are stored for 30 days. We recommend downloading your portraits as soon as they're ready. You can always regenerate using another credit.
faq.a4: Yes! We offer museum-quality canvas prints shipped across the EU. After generating your portrait, you can order a print directly from your dashboard.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a5: We accept all major credit and debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other local payment methods through our secure Stripe checkout.
faq.q6: What if the AI generation fails?
faq.a6: If a generation fails for any reason, your credit is automatically refunded. You can try again with the same or a different photo.
faq.a7: Yes, you can delete your account at any time from your dashboard settings. All your data, including uploaded photos and generated portraits, will be permanently removed in compliance with GDPR.

footer.description: Luxury AI pet portraits crafted with cutting-edge technology and artistic excellence.
footer.madeWith: Made with love for pet lovers in the EU
